value.fullName: Yes, I like to have clothes put away and messes cleaned up each day. Dirty dishes, laundry piles, or clutter may bother me if not taken care right away.
value.label: Yes, I like to have clothes put away and messes cleaned up each day. Dirty dishes, laundry piles, or clutter may bother me if not taken care right away.

value.fullName: No, a messy room may not bother me. I may put away clothes, clean dirty dishes, or take out trash when I have time. I may not notice right away that my room has become cluttered.
value.label: No, a messy room may not bother me. I may put away clothes, clean dirty dishes, or take out trash when I have time. I may not notice right away that my room has become cluttered.
